module.name: ap210_interconnect_technology_constraints
module.name.french: Contraintes de technologie d'interconnexion pour l'AP 210
module.keywords: module,minimum annular ring, aspect ratio, deposition thickness, terminal size,process specification, process requirement

abstract.p: the representation of interconnect technology constraints. This Data includes all information provided to the design team by fabrication suppliers from which may be derived default land and passage definitions, based on the desired yield for fabrication and assembly processes. Typical Data includes minimum annular ring, maximum passage aspect ratio, minimum deposition thickness, maximum terminal size supported for through hole technology class, and other critical material processing properties. Configuration management information and design change management information is provided. This data includes at least one geometric representation. This part of ISO 10303 also supports description of simple and complex templates for layout design. This part of ISO 10303 also supports definition of technology specific layer stackup models able to support multiple material combinations.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of interconnect technology constraints. This Data includes all information provided to the design team by fabrication suppliers from which may be derived default land and passage definitions, based on the desired yield for fabrication and assembly processes. Typical Data includes minimum annular ring, maximum passage aspect ratio, minimum deposition thickness, maximum terminal size supported for through hole technology class, and other critical material processing properties. Configuration management information and design change management information is provided. This data includes at least one geometric representation. This part of ISO 10303 also supports description of simple and complex templates for layout design. This part of ISO 10303 also supports definition of technology specific layer stackup models able to support multiple material combinations.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Design product data management, ISO/TS 10303-1628;
items within the scope of application module Fabrication technology, ISO/TS 10303-1670.
